# [FEAT] Third-party Integrations Framework

## Labels
`api`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement a framework for pre-built integrations with popular business tools.

## Requirements

### Integration Categories
- CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot)
- Communication (Slack, Teams)
- Project management (Jira, Asana)
- E-commerce (Shopify, WooCommerce)
- Analytics (Google Analytics)
- Productivity (Google Workspace, Microsoft 365)

### Integration Features
- OAuth-based connection
- Data synchronization
- Bi-directional sync
- Field mapping
- Sync scheduling
- Error handling

### Slack Integration
- Create tickets from Slack
- Ticket notifications in Slack
- Reply from Slack
- Status updates
- Slash commands

### Jira Integration
- Link tickets to Jira issues
- Create Jira issues from tickets
- Status sync
- Comment sync
- Priority mapping

### Salesforce Integration
- View customer data
- Link to Salesforce records
- Activity logging
- Case sync
- Contact sync

### Integration Management
- Connection status
- Sync logs
- Error notifications
- Reconnect flows
- Data mapping configuration

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk provides numerous integrations with popular business tools through its marketplace and native integrations.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Integration framework works
- [ ] OAuth connection functional
- [ ] Data sync operates correctly
- [ ] Error handling present
- [ ] Integration management UI
